context.rdfs:comment: Any offered product or service. For example: a pair of shoes; a concert ticket; the rental of a car; a haircut; or an episode of a TV show streamed online.
context.rdfs:label: Product

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is a consumable.
properties.rdfs:label: isConsumableFor

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part.
properties.rdfs:label: isAccessoryOrSparePartFor

properties.rdfs:comment: The model of the product. Use with the URL of a ProductModel or a textual representation of the model identifier. The URL of the ProductModel can be from an external source. It is recommended to additionally provide strong product identifiers via the gtin8/gtin13/gtin14 and mpn properties.
properties.rdfs:label: model

properties.rdfs:comment: The product identifier, such as ISBN. For example: meta itemprop="productID" content="isbn:123-456-789".
properties.rdfs:label: productID

properties.rdfs:comment: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
properties.rdfs:label: releaseDate
